name: Seethargundu Estate
description:
We're thrilled to reintroduce a beloved favourite, Seethargundu Estate! 

Seethargundu Estate delights with a captivating flavour profile. The aroma combines the subtle hints of Jaggery and Sugarcane, adding a warm and inviting touch. Its citrus-infused aftertaste leaves a refreshing and lingering impression, providing a delightful complexity. This one is a must try for light and medium roast lovers, especially if you enjoyed our delicate coffees like Howdia Estate, Kerehaklu Estate - Weaver Washed and Unakki Estate.

Situated in the Nelliyampathy Hills region of the Western Ghats in Kerala, Seethargundu Estate is a Demeter-certified biodynamic estate.

Tasting Notes: Malta Orange, Sugarcane, Red Apple

Roast Level: Medium

name: Wine Barrel Aged Coffee
description:
Meet our three-pack of wine barrel aged coffees, beautifully merging the world of fine wine and specialty coffee.  

Green coffee beans sourced from Baarbara Estate were aged for seven weeks in Fratelli wine barrels that had previously held three of their exceptional wines. The barrels were rotated every 5 days to ensure even infusion, and samples were drawn regularly to track the beans’ flavour development. After ageing, the beans rested for 10-15 days in our warehouses and were then roasted to a medium profile.  

From this process, three distinct, layered, and comforting coffees have emerged. Named after the wines previously stored in the barrels used during processing, the coffees in this selection are:  

  • MS Late Harvest treats you to notes of black cherry, prune, and red wine. 
  • Sette Collection brews cups with notes of red grape, orange, and walnut. 
  • J'Noon White tastes of sparkling wine, stone fruits, and raspberry. 

We recommend brewing this selection black.  

Note: The wine-like tasting notes in these coffees are a result of their unique processing. All offerings in this pack are non-alcoholic.

name: Wheat Bran Coconut cookies
description:
Indulge in our treats packed with rich flavour and loaded with fiber. Naturally sweetened with jaggery, each bite offers a wholesome and satisfying experience that’s as delicious as it is nutritious.

  • Naturally sweetened with jaggery
  • Crafted with 100% butter
  • Contains no refined flour
  • Packed with flavour and loaded with fibre
  • Each box contains 10 cookies

Indulge in the delightful blend of sweet dried cranberries and wholesome oats, baked into cookies that are both chewy and crispy. Made with 100% butter, these treats offer a rich, buttery flavour that complements their soft and satisfying texture. Enjoy the perfect balance of sweetness and crunch in every bite.

  • Chewy, soft, crispy and perfect for sharing
  • Crafted with 100% butter
  • Contains no refined flour and sugar

name: Assorted Cookie Box
description:
In life's big and small moments, it’s often the little things that make the biggest impact—like a pack of cookies. Packed with flavour and nutrition, our cookies are a reminder that joy can be found in simplicity. Savour the handcrafted goodness in every bite from our assorted range.  

Chocolate Chip Cookies: Savour the wholesome goodness of our chocolate chip cookies, made with a blend of nutrient-rich amaranth and whole wheat flour. 

Wheat Bran Coconut Cookies: Naturally sweetened with jaggery, each bite of our Wheat Bran Coconut cookies offers a wholesome and satisfying experience.  

Multi-Seed Millet Cookies: Savour our guilt-free cookies, packed with a crunchy blend of nutritious seeds for a wholesome, satisfying treat. 

Oatmeal and Cranberry Cookies: Indulge in the delightful blend of sweet, dried cranberries and wholesome oats, baked into cookies that are both chewy and crispy.

name: 5-in-1 Explorer Pack
description:
Want to try different flavours before deciding which one to settle on? 

Order our 5-in-1 Explorer pack and find a new favourite!  

This pack is a curated collection of five different coffees with different flavour profiles from our wide range of Indian coffees: 

  • A balanced Silver Oak Blend 

  • A bold and bitter Vienna Roast 

  • A chocolatey and nutty coffee from Attikan Estate 

  • A chocolatey and nutty coffee from Dhak Blend 

  • A chocolatey and nutty coffee from Thogarihunkal Estate

Each Sampler Pack will contain 75 g x 5 pouches of whole coffee beans or ground coffee.

name: Cold Brew Bags - Bold
description:
Chocolatey + Robust

Our Cold Brew Bold is a dark roast perfect for those who enjoy a robust kick in their coffee and prefer low acidity. This blend has a nutty flavour profile with notes of dark chocolate and roasted nuts. Perfect for milky drinks. 

Each box contains Cold Brew sachets of 50g each.

name: Basankhan Estate
description:
We are thrilled to present our first ever single origin dark roast, with coffee beans sourced from a new partner farm— Estate in Chikmagalur, Karnataka. 

This coffee has a journey of rich, complex flavours that will leave you craving for more. As you take a sip, enjoy the velvety mouthfeel reminiscent of dark chocolate, which enhances the overall richness of this brew. The coffee’s body is heavy and round, creating a luscious and full-bodied experience that envelops your palate. If you’ve liked our dark roasts like Vienna and Dhak, you’ll love this one! 
The Basankhan Estate is a family-owned farm located in Chikmagalur, Karnataka with a rich history spanning over 100 years. In addition to coffee, the estate cultivates other crops such as black pepper, oranges, cardamom, lemons, and bananas.

If you like your coffee light, fruity and complex in flavours, this one could be your next favourite.  

With a clean and crisp body, you'll be treated to aromas of jaggery and sugarcane, a syrupy mouthfeel, and a smooth, velvety texture, followed by a lingering aftertaste of refreshing citrus.  

Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pours.

name: Coffee Journal
description:
This journal is for coffee drinkers ranging from experimentalists to avid cupping experts. Take tasting notes, sharpen your palate or just list which coffees and brewing techniques you like the most (you can also note down which coffees you'd like to recommend to friends, family members or colleagues!).

Map your coffee journey as you brew your next thirty coffees. Also, ideal as gifts for those who are about to embark on their coffee journey or want to maintain a record of their experience but haven't found the best way to do so.

72 pages / A6 / 105 MM X 148 MM
INCLUDES A glossary defining all the terms

Made in India in collaboration with Origin One using
paper from sustainable sources.

name: Moka Pot Hoodie
description:
Here’s our love for brewing, and the warmth you need for winter, woven into a hooded sweatshirt. Incredibly soft and breathable, it features a kangaroo pocket and an illustration of a Moka pot inspired by indigenous and modern art on the back. 

  • Unisex; fits as expected   
  • Double silicon washed for extra softness  
  • Printed using gold-standard dyes  
  • Made using cotton fleece (80% cotton and 20% polyester)

M 42 26 25
L 44 27.1/2 26
XL 46 28.1/2 27

name: Milky coffee
description:
Try before you commit with our customised sampler pack. 

A selection of medium-dark and dark roasts, coffees from this sampler pack pair really well with milk. Try this today to make strong brews that you can enjoy hot as well as cold.

Each Sampler Pack contains 75 g x 3 pouches.

name: Mixed | Light to Dark Roasts - Easy Pour
description:
Brewing made easy! Our mixed bag contains a range of single-estate coffees of different roast levels, so you can try them all. Seethargundu Estate is a light roast that offers a clean, crisp body, sweet aromas and a refreshing citrusy aftertaste, while Vienna is a dark roast that’s bitter and bold. Thogarihunkal Estate is a fruity medium roast and Attikan Estate is medium-dark that packs a nutty, chocolatey punch, Jacaranda Blend is a sweet, and chocolatey medium-dark roast.

Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes.

source_data.title: Mixed | Light to Dark Roasts - Easy Pour
source_data.body_html:
Brewing made easy! Our mixed bag contains a range of single-estate coffees of different roast levels, so you can try them all. Seethargundu Estate is a light roast that offers a clean, crisp body, sweet aromas and a refreshing citrusy aftertaste, while Vienna is a dark roast that’s bitter and bold. Thogarihunkal Estate is a fruity medium roast and Attikan Estate is medium-dark that packs a nutty, chocolatey punch, Jacaranda Blend is a sweet, and chocolatey medium-dark roast.

Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes.

name: Customised Sampler Pack
description:
Our assorted sampler pack is for those who want to try our coffee beans, whether as whole beans or ground coffee, but don't know where to start. This customizable mixed bag of coffee beans allows you to choose between three different coffees to discover which ones work best for you. 

Each Sampler Pack will contain 75 g x 3 pouches.

name: The Rich & Bold Trio Pack-Coffee beans
description:
Introducing our Rich & Bold Trio Pack of whole coffee beans or ground coffee, meticulously curated to help you explore our world of dark coffee wonders. Whether you're new to our brand or simply looking to diversify your coffee experience, this customisable mixed bag  is your gateway to discovering the ideal darker brews for your taste buds. 

Inside this carefully crafted sampler pack, you'll find three coffees: 

Vienna Roast: Rich and smoky notes with a perfect balance of boldness and smoothness.
French Roast: For those who crave the deep, dark intensity of a very dark roast. 
Silver Oak: Celebrated for its complex flavours and versatility, this one is our own in-house cafe blend 

Each Sampler Pack will contain 75 g x 3 pouches.

name: Thogarihunkal Estate
description: Start your day with the sweet aromas of toffee from our newest harvest from Thogarihunkal Estate. This delicious medium roast, with flavours of brown sugar, green grape and roasted almond, tastes great when taken black or with a little bit of milk. This coffee was processed using the washed method, developing the coffee beans to have a clean flavour profile with low acidity and bitterness, and a sweet, long aftertaste of honey and raisins. You can enjoy the smooth, buttery mouthfeel of this medium-bodied coffee by brewing it as an Espresso or a Pour Over, or by using other manual brewing methods.

source_data.title: Thogarihunkal Estate
source_data.body_html: Start your day with the sweet aromas of toffee from our newest harvest from Thogarihunkal Estate. This coffee was processed using the washed method, developing the coffee beans to have a clean flavour profile with low acidity and bitterness, and a sweet, long aftertaste of honey and raisins. You can enjoy the smooth, buttery mouthfeel of this medium-bodied coffee by brewing it as an Espresso or a Pour Over, or by using other manual brewing methods.

name: Orange Mint
description:
Zesty and refreshing coffee in a can, this cold brew brings out notes of citrus and mint in every
sip. Roasted with precision for a unique flavour, it has balanced acidity and low bitterness.

Like all our cold brews, it uses 100% arabica beans,
sourced directly from India’s best farms.

How it’s brewed:

Specialty-grade Arabica coffee is steeped for 18 hours
to bring out a zesty and refreshing flavour.

Ingredients:

Filtered Water (85.10%), 100% Arabica Coffee (12.50%),
Orange Mint Syrup (2.4%)

Nutritional Values (per 100ml):

Energy 29.44kcal, Carbs 6.84g, Natural Sugar 1.71g,
Protein 0.52g, Total Fat 0g, Cholesterol 0mg, Sodium 1.62mg

name: Assorted 6-Pack
description:
Our multi-flavoured 6-pack of cold brew cans is the perfect way to try all our new, delicious cold brews. In this pack, you’ll find an assortment of our coffee cans, with options for diverse palates:

1 x Classic Bold
1 x Classic Light
1 x Elderflower
1 x Orange Mint
1 x Mocha Cold Coffee
1 x Classic Cold Coffee

All our cold brews use 100% Arabica coffee beans, are sourced directly from India’s best farms and are roasted with precision for a unique flavour.

Each can is 250ml.

name: Classic Bold
description:
Our signature Classic Bold cold brew brings out delicious nutty and chocolatey notes.
The Classic Bold flavour is the one we've always served in our cafes, and has been one
of our most popular cold brews with its heavy body, low acidity and bittersweet finish.
Drink as is or with milk. 

All our cold brews use 100% Arabica coffee beans,
are sourced directly from India’s best farms and
are roasted with precision for a unique flavour.

Ingredients:

Filtered water, 100% Arabica coffee

Nutritional Values (per 100ml):

Energy 12 cal,
Carbs 1.2g, Natural Sugar 1.0g, Protein 0.9g, Total Fat 0.4g

Each can is 250ml.

This product contains no added sugars.

You can purchase this as a pack of 2 or 6. Save 12% when you purchase a pack of 6!

name: Cold Brew Bags - Light Blend
description:
Fruity + Refreshing

If you enjoy a fruity flavour profile, this one’s for you. Our Cold Brew Light is a refreshing blend that shines with fruity notes of berry and subtle hints of white chocolate, best consumed black. 

Each box contains Cold Brew sachets of 50g each.

name: Cold Brew Bags - Kalledeverapura
description:
Rich + Smooth

This single estate Cold Brew option is a medium roast sourced from one of our oldest farm partners, Kalledevarapura Estate, situated in the hills of Chikmagalur. With beautiful notes of stone fruit and toffee, this blend can be enjoyed black or with milk.

Each box contains Cold Brew sachets of 50g each.

name: Thogarihunkal Estate | Medium Roast - Easy Pour
description:
Fruity + Medium Bodied

We love the tasting notes of apricot, blueberry and cashew that shine through in this honey sun-dried, medium roast. Thogarihunkal Estate’s fruity notes and medium body are perfect for when you need a quick, delicious pick-me-up!

 

Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes.

name: Attikan Estate | Medium-Dark Roast - Easy Pour
description:
Nutty + Chocolatey

If you like your coffee a little dark, but not too much, this one is perfect for you. It has low acidity and flavour notes of figs, dark chocolate and roasted almonds. The delicious nuttiness of this medium-dark roast hits all the right notes, whether enjoyed with milk or black.

 

Choose from our pack of 5 or pack of 10 Easy Pour boxes.

name: Tote Bag
description: Whether you’re heading to the market, or need something to carry your essentials on a day out, our new tote bags are roomy enough to accommodate everything you need. They are made with canvas and have a lining inside and it features our signature print of women sifting through coffee beans, made by the Rajasthani artist, Tejuben.

name: Notebooks
description:
All our notebooks are made with 100% cotton handmade paper by Craft Boat, an organisation that works with garment manufacturers to recycle unused cotton textiles which would otherwise have been dumped in landfills. The textile scraps are them made into paper pulp before being converted into sheets of paper for these notebooks. 

All our Blue Tokai notebook covers were screen printed by hand and depict a panoramic scene of a coffee farm by Mata Ni Pachedi artist, Jagdish Chitara. 


Choose between blue, yellow and pink.

The dimensions of the notebooks are 14cm x 0.7cm x 21cm and each notebook has 24 blank pages.

name: Peacock and Bull Screen Print
description:
For all prints, 50% of the profit will go directly to the artist. Each print is created on A4 size card stock paper.

When we showed Mata ni Pachedi artist, Jagdish Chitara, our photos from the coffee farms, he told us that what struck him the most was the abundance of wildlife on the farms. Bison, peacocks, elephants, monkeys and a whole array of birds are just a few examples of species that consider these coffee farms to be their home. In India, unlike countries like Brazil, coffee is shade grown and bird friendly which means that coffee shrubs grow protected under the shade of older and larger trees which also offer a natural habitat to a number of animals including birds. 

Jagdish created two images that highlighted the natural wildlife that is found on coffee farms - the Cow and the Peacock, and The Elephant and the Boar.

About this print: This image depicts the numerous stories we heard of wild elephants on nearly every farm we visited. In fact, people living on most of these farms had a very early curfew so not to interfere with the movement of wild elephants as a sign of respect for the wildlife in their area (and also, we're supposing, to stay safe!). In this image, Jagdish recreates the notion of the commanding elephant and ubiquitous boar.
